articles.title: Andy's Favorite Sugary Snack
articles.contents:
Andy's Sandbox
          About Me
          
          
          Silly Projects(WIP)
          
          
          Somewhat Serious Projects
           
          ▾
          
          
          Risk Polarization Simulation
          Risk Polarization Power Analysis
          
          
          
          
          Ongoing Projects
           
          ▾
          
          
          Forecasting
          Data Analytics
          Choosing Risks with embedR
          
          
          ☰
          
          
      
        
          
            
              
            
              Andy’s Favorite Sugary Snack
            
            
              
                
                    
                      
                        LinkedIn
                      
                    
                  
                                    
                    
                      
                        GitHub
                      
                    
                  
                                    
                    
                      
                        Email
                      
                    
                  
                                  
            
          
        
        
        
          
            As I’m trying trying to be less present online, I do not
            like to post a picture of myself. As such, hopefully this
            delightful picture of my favorite treat can compensate for
            that!
            In case you really are curious though, please click the
            button below:
            
            Show/Hide
            
            
            
            
            I am (currently) a MSc student enrolled in the faculty of
            psychology at the University of Basel, with a passion for
            statistics and data science in general. Generally having a
            lot of interests, I like to explore on my own pace. My data
            science skills are self-taught, which is backed up by
            methodological and statistical knowledge of the statistics
            courses at the University.
            But as a psychology student, I know one should not take
            self-reports at face value… So I let the chess
            riddle speak for itself:
            
            “Death, taxes, and Andy trying every opportunity possible to
            get involved with R and statistics”
          
        
      
    

    
      
        
          
            
              
            
              Andy’s Favorite Sugary Snack

              for statistics and data science in general. Generally
              having a lot of interests, I like to explore on my own

              backed up by methodological and statistical knowledge of
              the statistics courses at the University.
              But as a psychology student, I know one should not take
              self-reports at face value… So I let the chess

articles.title: Welcome to the Website!
articles.description: Be Sure to Read the Disclaimer Before Diving In
articles.contents:
Disclaimer:
Before you dive into my humble webpage, I want to make one thing clear: please do not take the work here too seriously!
This website is my playground - a place where I experiment with code (and often break it!), share my subjective opinions on personal projects, and document my coding adventures during my time at the University of Basel.
So, buckle up and get ready to embark on a journey filled with silly ideas, playful experiments and pure chaos.
Warm regards,
Andy
